pkgmetadata.longdescription: Discrete Matrix/Tensor Decomposition // Semi-Binary and Semi- Ternary Matrix Decomposition are performed based on Non- negative Matrix Factorization (NMF) and Gradient Descent-based Singular Value Decomposition (GD-SVD). For the details of the methods, see the reference section of GitHub README.md https://github.com/rikenbit/dcTensor.
